Partner Federations

Trusted martial arts organizations on Sparout

Ring Fight

Featured

International Ring Fight Federation - Promoting professional ring fighting across the globe. Organizers of championship-level MMA and kickboxing events in India.

Visit Website

Karate India

National governing body for Karate in India. Affiliated with World Karate Federation. Organizes national championships and selects athletes for international competition.

Visit Website

Taekwondo Federation of India

Official federation for Taekwondo in India. Affiliated with World Taekwondo. Promotes the Korean martial art across all Indian states.

Visit Website
